topic.title: NHS Continuing Healthcare Previously Unassessed Period of Care Decision Made Date
topic.shortdesc: An NHS Continuing Healthcare Previously Unassessed Period Of Care Decision Made Date is the date the outcome of the decision following the review of a NHS Continuing Healthcare Previously Unassessed Period of Care was made.
